plot: A trilogy made on a visit to Chile in November 2011. "Homage" is a visit to Valparaiso. "Community" is a portrait of Población La Victoria and its community television station, Señal 3. "...
title: Three Short Films About Chile
plot_es: A trilogy made on a visit to Chile in November 2011. "Homage" is a visit to Valparaiso. "Community" is a portrait of Población La Victoria and its community television station, Señal 3. "...
